name: The City Runner
description:
The City Runner 

In This game, you are the runner. The police have been looking for you. Try to collect as many coins as you can.

NOTE: There is a delay in loading the map in the webGL version

Credit:

  • Cars created by Odd1In from itch.io
  • Trees created by Jaks from itch.io 
  •  Game foundation  by Shahzaib52 from UnityList 
  • Road models are created by loafbrr from itch.io
  •  UI assets from MSU 
  •  Menu audio created by Alexander from orangefreesounds.com 
  •  Created by Najla Alshehri
